mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, email, password_hash, avatar_url, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{passwordHash}, #{avatarUrl}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: select * from user where username = #{usernameOrEmail} or email = #{usernameOrEmail}

SELECT id, username, avatar_url, created_at FROM user WHERE username LIKE #{keyword} OR email LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY CASE WHEN username = #{keyword} THEN 1 -- 完全匹配优先 WHEN username LIKE #{keyword} THEN 2 ELSE 3 END, created_at DESC
